mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_CATEGORY WHERE PARENT_KEY = ( SELECT CTG_KEY FROM T_CATEGORY WHERE PARENT_KEY = #{ctgKey} AND ROLE_TYPE = 12001 ) AND VALUE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY POS ASC
SELECT VALUE_1 as fileUrl, VALUE_3 as colorCode, VALUE_4 as targetUrl, TYPE FROM T_CATEGORY_OTHER_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND ctg_key = #{ctgKey} AND TYPE = 1 ORDER BY POS ASC

SELECT VALUE_1 as fileUrl, VALUE_3 as colorCode, VALUE_4 as targetUrl, VALUE_5 as title, TYPE, POS as num FROM T_CATEGORY_OTHER_INFO WHERE ctg_key = #{ctgKey} AND TYPE = 1 ORDER BY POS ASC
OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT #{listNumber} ROWS ONLY

SELECT B.NAME as popupName, B.contents FROM T_LINK_KEY A INNER JOIN T_POPUP B ON A.RES_KEY = B.POPUP_KEY WHERE A.REQ_KEY = #{ctgKey} AND A.REQ_TYPE = 100 AND A.RES_TYPE = 300 AND B.IS_SHOW = 1 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mm:ss') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(B.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mm:ss') AND TO_CHAR(B.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mm:ss') ORDER BY A.POS ASC

SELECT A.VALUE_5 as teacherTitle, A.value_4 as targetUrl, D.NAME as teacherName, A.value_long_1 as subjectCode, A.value_long_2 as teacherKey, A.value_bit_1 as isNewPageOpen, B.IMAGE_LIST as teacherImage, C.NAME as subjectName FROM T_CATEGORY_OTHER_INFO A INNER JOIN T_TEACHER B ON A.VALUE_LONG_2 = B.TEACHER_KEY INNER JOIN T_CATEGORY C ON A.VALUE_LONG_1 = C.CTG_KEY INNER JOIN T_USER D ON B.USER_KEY = D.USER_KEY WHERE A.ctg_key = #{ctgKey} AND A.type = 1
AND D.INTEREST_CTG_KEY_0 = 4256
AND D.INTEREST_CTG_KEY_0 != 4256
ORDER BY A.pos ASC

SELECT A.*, B.*, C.PRICE, C.SELL_PRICE, D.TEACHER_KEY, E.IMAGE_LIST as teacherImage FROM T_CATEGORY_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.g_key = B.g_key INNER JOIN T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION C ON B.G_KEY = C.G_KEY INNER JOIN T_GOODS_TEACHER_LINK D ON A.G_KEY = D.G_KEY INNER JOIN T_TEACHER E ON D.TEACHER_KEY = E.TEACHER_KEY WHERE B.emphasis = 2 AND A.ctg_key = #{ctgKey} AND B.is_sell = 1 AND B.type = 2

SELECT DISTINCT C.NAME as subjectName, D.NAME as teacherName FROM T_CATEGORY_OTHER_INFO A INNER JOIN T_TEACHER B ON A.VALUE_LONG_2 = B.TEACHER_KEY INNER JOIN T_CATEGORY C ON A.VALUE_LONG_1 = C.CTG_KEY INNER JOIN T_USER D ON B.USER_KEY = D.USER_KEY WHERE B.TEACHER_KEY = #{teacherKey}

SELECT A.*, B.*, D.TEACHER_KEY, F.NAME as teacherName, E.IMAGE_LIST as teacherImage, (SELECT SELL_PRICE FROM T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION WHERE G_KEY = B.G_KEY AND ROWNUM = 1) as sellPrice, (SELECT PRICE FROM T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION WHERE G_KEY = B.G_KEY AND ROWNUM = 1) as price FROM T_CATEGORY_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.g_key = B.g_key INNER JOIN T_GOODS_TEACHER_LINK D ON A.G_KEY = D.G_KEY INNER JOIN T_TEACHER E ON D.TEACHER_KEY = E.TEACHER_KEY INNER JOIN T_USER F ON E.USER_KEY = F.USER_KEY WHERE B.emphasis in (0,1,2) AND A.ctg_key = #{ctgKey} AND B.is_sell = 1 AND B.is_show = 1 AND B.type = 1 ORDER BY POS ASC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NAME FROM t_category_goods A INNER JOIN t_category B ON A.CTG_KEY = B.CTG_KEY WHERE G_KEY = #{gKey} AND B.VALUE_NUMBER= 0 ORDER BY A.POS ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM =1

SELECT A.*, B.*, (SELECT SELL_PRICE FROM T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION WHERE G_KEY = B.G_KEY AND ROWNUM = 1) as sellPrice, (SELECT PRICE FROM T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION WHERE G_KEY = B.G_KEY AND ROWNUM = 1) as price FROM T_CATEGORY_GOODS A LEFT JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.g_key = B.g_key WHERE A.ctg_key = #{ctgKey} AND B.IS_SELL = 1 AND B.IS_SHOW = 1

SELECT IDX, BBS_MASTER_KEY, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') as createDate, TITLE FROM T_NOTICE WHERE 1=1 AND BBS_MASTER_KEY = #{bbsMasterKey} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT A.G_KEY, B.IMAGE_LIST, C.SUBJECT_CTG_KEY, B.NAME as bookName, D.SELL_PRICE, D.PRICE, C.WRITER, E.NAME as bookCompanyName, '[10%할인+5%적립]' as subName FROM T_CATEGORY_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY INNER JOIN T_BOOK C ON A.G_KEY = C.G_KEY LEFT JOIN T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION D ON B.G_KEY = D.G_KEY LEFT JOIN T_CP E ON B.CP_KEY = E.CP_KEY WHERE A.CTG_KEY = 229 AND B.TYPE = 3 AND B.IS_SHOW = 1 ORDER BY A.G_KEY DESC
